rows.label: qst702703_msg0001
rows.name:
I need you to defeat the monsters
that have set up camp in front of
the bridge to the Haradd Hills.

rows.label: qst702703_msg0002
rows.name:
If I don't make the delivery
in time, my father will
fly off the handle...

rows.label: qst702703_msg0003
rows.name:
I hope you deal with it
soon! You're my only hope.

rows.label: qst702703_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, you got rid of them?!
Drivers sure have some
skills... Thanks a bunch!

rows.label: qst702703_msg0102
rows.name:
"Simple manual labor," my
arse... Nothing simple
about this, ya codger!

rows.label: qst702703_msg0103
rows.name:
...Ugh, and still, I've gotta
hurry if I don't want to get
fed a knuckle sandwich...

rows.label: qst702703_msg0104
rows.name:
Here! I've not got much to offer,
but take this, with my thanks.

rows.label: qst702703_msg0105
rows.name:
We work as gardeners in the
capital, my dad and me. If you're
ever in the area, come say hi!

rows.label: qst702703_msg0106
rows.name:
Right-o then... How much sand
did he say we needed again...?

rows.label: qst702703_msg0107
rows.name:
Eh, I'll remember along
the way, I'm sure.
